creditline: Gift of the Elizabeth C. Quinlan Foundation, Inc.
description: plate, set of four, George III; moulded rim of five curved sections with heavy gadrooned edge; on rim of each plate, a ducal coat-of-arms (unidentifed) is engraved with the motto: [PRODESSE QUAM CONSPICI]; each is clearly marked on the back of the rim

title: Soup plate, from a set of four
